text: وَأَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنِّي لَا يَخَافُ لَدَيَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

translation.en: And [he was told], "Throw down your staff." But when he saw it writhing as if it were a snake, he turned in flight and did not return. [Allah said], "O Moses, fear not. Indeed, in My presence the messengers do not fear
translation.id: dan lemparkanlah tongkatmu!" Maka ketika (tongkat itu menjadi ular dan) Musa melihatnya bergerak-gerak seperti seekor ular yang gesit, larilah dia berbalik ke belakang tanpa menoleh. "Wahai Musa! Jangan takut! Sesungguhnya dihadapan-Ku para rasul tidak perlu takut
